p: The supernatants were placed onto a silica gel precoated plate (Kieselgel 60 F254, 0.20 mm, Merck, Darmstadt, Germany). The TLC plates were added with a solvent mixture of dichloromethane : methanol : water : acetic acid (10 : 1:0.1 : 0.2, v/ v), followed by immersion into 10% sulfuric acid, and then the mixture was heated. Using the color distribution state of TLC, similar effluents were gathered, and the solvent was drained through a rotary evaporator. Different concentrates were freeze-dried into a powder and kept at −80°C until use.
